snippet: The men were kidnapped Wednesday in the northern state of Coahuila, where the vehicle had been stolen, the official said.
abstract: Fourteen men are kidnapped and killed in San Luis Potosi State in Mexico; attack bears hallmarks of drug gangs, but it is not clear which group is responsible or who victims are.
lead_paragraph: The men were kidnapped Wednesday in the northern state of Coahuila, where the vehicle had been stolen, the official said.

headline.main: Mexico: Bodies of 14 Men Found in Van
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Bodies of 14 Men Found in Van
